name: you see: yourself you see: your phone you see: you see: you see
name_original: you see: yourself you see: your phone you see: you see: you see
description:
a text adventure about gender dysphoria and college

hey my name is judge and this is my first game ever! i made it for a half-semester class about basic C. it's an autobiographical mess and might be unplayable but i'm proud of it. feel trans! feel anxious! feel guilty! it's all here
